snippet: Diplomats from Japan and North Korea talked for two hours on Monday in an informal meeting that could be a first step toward the reopening of an official dialogue between the countries.
abstract: Diplomats from Japan and North Korea talk for two hours in an informal meeting in the Chinese city of Shenyang that could be a first step toward reopening of an official dialogue between the two countries.
lead_paragraph: Diplomats from Japan and North Korea talked for two hours on Monday in an informal meeting that could be a first step toward the reopening of an official dialogue between the countries.

headline.main: Japan: Informal Talks Held With North Korean Envoys
headline.print_headline: Japan: Informal Talks Held With North Korean Envoys
